import classes from './CartItem.module.css' import deleteIcon from '../../asset/icon-delete.svg' function CartItem(props) { const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` console.log(props) const deleteItem=()=>{ } return

{props.name}

{price} x {props.quant} ${props.totalAmt}

} export default CartItem
